title: The $99 Chatbot That Saves You Hours a Week: A Real-World Case Study on Automating Customer Q&A with AI
excerpt: Discover how a small consulting firm implemented a $99/month chatbot that reduced customer service time by 15 hours per week while improving response times and customer satisfaction.
author: Joe Perez

seo.metaDescription: Real case study: How a $99 chatbot saved 15 hours per week in customer service while improving satisfaction. Includes implementation details and ROI analysis.
